intervention_catalogue.name: Dependency and recovery services
intervention_catalogue.short_description: Dependency and recovery services offer men support with recovery from substance abuse, including drug and alcohol addiction.
long_description: Dependency and recovery services offer men support with recovery from substance abuse, including drug and alcohol addiction.
intervention_catalogue.session_detail: The type, number and length of sessions can vary, depending on the location and service provider.

possible_outcomes: Dependency and recovery services aim to achieve one or more of the following outcomes:
• stopping the use of harmful and addictive substances like drugs and alcohol
• developing skills to avoid or manage situations that may encourage the use of harmful substances
• strengthening self-belief to manage or prevent using addictive substances
• improving physical health and mental resilience
• establishing plans to manage addictive behaviours, including support from other treatment providers and detox programmes
• better understanding of addiction, what causes it and options to reduce dependency
